member.name: T:Enkoni.Framework.Validation.Validators.TimeSpanRangeValidator
member.summary: Performs validation on TimeSpan instances by comparing them to the specified boundaries.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Validation.Validators.TimeSpanRangeValidator.#ctor(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with an upper bound constraint.
member.param: The upper bound.
member.remarks: No lower bound constraints will be checked by this instance, and the upper bound check will be .

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with an upper bound constraint.
member.param: The upper bound.
True if the validator must negate the result of the validation.
member.remarks: No lower bound constraints will be checked by this instance, and the upper bound check will be .
